name: Elixir 3
description:
Blocks are constantly falling into the arena – don't let them reach the top! Click on the blocks and use a variety of fun powerups to destroy them and last as long as you can against endlessly increasing difficulty. Shop with the points you earn to buy palettes, new items, and upgrades to survive for even longer each run.

Includes keyboard-click and auto-click accessibility options for those not fond of rapid mouse clicking.

Made with Game Maker 8.0.
Only compatible with Windows.
